Distance Education Info: Birla Institute of Technology & Science offers WILP (Work Integrated Learning Programs) in distance mode. Under this initiative, BITS pilani offers courses including MTech, Btech, MBA and MSc, and certificate courses as well for working professionals. The WILP courses offered by BITS pilani are offered in distance learning mode and are UGC approve. | Admission to these courses is offered based on marks grabbed by students in their last qualifying exam. The institute has also collaborated with Airbus to train professionals in the domain of Data Analytics, Government of Telangana to lead the education sector in state and develop technology enabled laboratories for Engineering Institutions, CitiusTech Partners to Upskill technology enthusiast and professionals in the field of Data Science and Business Analytics, Cummins India to promote a culture of continuous learning and training individuals in latest technologies through amazing programs and lastly with Oppo India to develop an innovative workspace for ambitious professionals.

Distance Education Info: SASTRA University, Directorate of Online and Distance Education located in Thirumalaisamudram, Tamil Nadu was established in the year 2002.  The university is affiliated with SASTRA University and offers various UG and PG courses in the fields of Management, Arts, Computer Application and Commerce. Admission to all the courses is purely merit-based. SASTRA University Distance Education is recognized by NCTE and IGNOU. The university aims to provide higher education through online mode for students who lack access to conventional classrooms. SASTRA University Distance Education provides admission to UG courses for candidates with a minimum eligibility of 10+2 from a recognized board. Students can access a 100% e-VBAB scholarship offered by the Government of India to pursue online UG, PG, Diploma and Certificate programs offered by various reputed Indian Universities/Institutes in various disciplines including

Distance Education Info: Manipal University, Jaipur - Online Manipal offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in various disciplines such as Human Resources, Marketing, Computer Application, Commerce and Journalism. Manipal Online is approved by AICTE and is recognized by UGC (University Grants Commission) and WES (World Education Services). It provides flexible learning opportunities, e-learning material and full-fledged program delivery through the Internet using technology-assisted mechanisms and resources. Students can access more than 10,000 courses on Coursera. | Manipal Online Scholarships are awarded to students based on their merit in Class 12. Students from low economic backgrounds and other special categories are also eligible for Manipal Online Scholarships. Some of the scholarships offered by Manipal Online are as follows:

Distance Education Info: SRM Institute of Science and Technology Directorate of Online Education formerly known as SRM University Chennai DDE is the department located in Kattankulathur, Chennai. The institute has 4 campuses in Kattankulathur, Ramapuram, Vadapalani of Chennai and Modi Nagar of Ghaziabad. SRM University offers Distance Education for students who can acquire university degree from the comfort of their homes. All the courses provided by SRM University distance education courses are recognized by UGC and MHRD and accredited by NAAC. The university offers many UG and PG courses in the field of Management, Commerce, and Computer Application through distance learning.

There are 5 UG, 3 PG and various other Diploma courses offered by SODEL. Affiliated to Jaipur National University which is considered to be the topmost university in Rajasthan and is among the top 20 private universities in India. The admission to various courses is done through both online as well as offline mode.

Distance Education Info: Bharath Institute of Higher Education and Research is a distance learning institute which is approved by AICTE. BIHER is the first private university in India to get the coveted international accreditation from ABET, USA in 2018. The institute offers BBA, B.Com and BA courses at the undergraduate level and offers M.Com program at the postgraduate level. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination. Some of the top recruiters that recruit BIHER’s students include Capgemini, Amazon, Wipro, Byju’s, L&T Ltd. etc.

Distance Education Info: Shoolini University Online is a distance learning university in Solan, Himachal Pradesh which came into existence in 2022. The university offers various courses in diverse disciplines at the undergraduate and the postgraduate level. It is India’s first online university which offers Pay after Placement option for the students. Admission to the courses offered by the university is done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination. Some of the top recruiters that recruit Shoolini’s students include LG, ICICI Bank, Nestle, L&T and One Score among various others.

Sikkim Manipal University Distance Education [SMU-DE] has been awarded as the “Best University in Distance Learning” by ASSOCHAM India. It has also won Silver Award in Digital Learning Transformation Category in 2018. The university offers total 6 undergraduate and postgraduate level courses in Management and Information Technology in distance mode. SMUDE has a vibrant alumni community with over 5 lakh alumni members. Check out other top distance MBA colleges and courses in India

Graphic Era University Online is a private university approved by UGC which is located in Dehradun, Uttarakhand. The university offers various courses in diverse disciplines at the undergraduate and the postgraduate level. Admission to the MBA course will be done based on the candidate's performance in national or state level management entrance exams such as CAT/ MAT/ NMAT/ CMAT etc. The training and placement cell at GEU Online aims at providing a 100% placement assistance to its students.

Distance Education Info: Suresh Gyan Vihar University, a private university in Jaipur, Rajasthan, has established SGVU Directorate of Distance Education. The institute has been known for its academic excellence in online education for the past ten years after NAAC accreditation with a Grade A. It is also the first university in Rajasthan with a NAAC ‘A’ grade. DNA has placed it at rank 1 among private universities in Rajasthan. Their initiative of distance education in popular courses like MBA and BA Journalism is helping students through online accessibility and affordability. The total course fees range from INR 11k to 75k.

Distance Education Info: School of Distance Learning of Jagan Nath University, JIMS Group has been established in 2010 by Distance Education Council. The university promotes quality education to all who are not able to pursue higher conventional method of education due to some reasons. It is affiliated to Jagan Nath University which is an ISO 9001-2015 Certified Institution. | The objective of Distance education is to acquire knowledge to produce energetic, effective efficient and ethically driven students to serve society. The Distance learning is an alternative to regular courses for those who are unable to pursue education due to many reasons. The mode of teaching in Distance learning is primarily via the internet and offer new teaching methodologies specially designed course materials by the specialists from various universities and industries and tailored means of delivery. Thus students can learn from anywhere all around the country.

ICFAI University, Directorate of Distance Education, Agartala, Tripura was launched in the year 2007 to provide flexible learning options to those unable to attend full time courses. It offers courses such as BBA, MBA, MBA Executive, PG Diploma and Diploma in the field of Management. Admission to the university is done on the basis of merit. Interested candidates can apply in online or offline mode.

Distance Education Info: Parul University Online is a Gujarat-based, NAAC accredited (A++ Grade) and leading multidisciplinary destination which came into existence in 2015. It offers a wide range of AICTE accredited Undergraduate, Postgraduate, doctoral and Diploma courses with the support of its amazing faculties and amalgamation of various institutes. The strength of the University lies in its 50000+ students and 3500+ international students followed by 500+ Ph.D. Guides, 320+ Filed Patents & Granted Patents, 100+ Visiting Faculties, 12+ Cr In Innovation Grants, and .

Dr. CV Raman University, Institute of Open and Distance Education (IODE), Bilaspur is awarded ‘Best University in Distance Online Learning’ by ASSOCHAM and awarded with the ‘World Education Award’ for best and next practices in Open and Distance Learning at World Education Summit. With 87 proposed study centers across Chhattisgarh, this institute offers students 41 different courses in 5 different departments. IODE Bilaspur offers degree and diploma in the discipline of Management, Information Technology, Commerce, Science, Biology, Economics, etc.

Distance Education Info: Shri Venkateshwara University (SVU) is an Amroha-based Private University that came into existence with the aim to offer Distance Education to working professionals in the discipline of Engineering through its Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses namely B.Tech and M.Tech. The University is approved by University Grants Commission, All India Council for Technical Education, Bar Council of India, Pharmacy Council of India, and Indian Nursing Council and admission to university courses is granted based on the score obtained by the candidate in the respective Diploma/degree course and work experience of 1-2 years. Shri Venkateshwara University is a constituent institution of and is managed by Venkateshwara Group of Institutions and offers Engineering programs under the School of Engineering (SOE) which ultimately helps professionals to interact and engage with local industries and corporate mentors.
